title: lagosnoir

content: LUSH Nature Landscape Oil Painting Auction.Description: "Lush" . 40 inches width, 36 inches height, oil on canvas by A.A.Aqeeb. A natural landscape painting, part of his nature conservation themed collection of 2021.Front Image: https://www.imagebam.com/view/MEMBCSGBack Image : https://www.imagebam.com/view/MEMBCSDPayment methods accepted: Bitcoin Escrow Only.Starting bid:0.020 BTC with bid increments of 0.005 BTC.Buy it now: 0.055 BTCEnd date and time: The end of July 30, 2023. 11.59 PM Midnight ( GMT)See countdown Link: https://www.tickcounter.com/countdown/4237393/arttrade Shipping: Bid price includes worldwide shipping to your address.Art on canvas will be shipped unframed in mailing tube.Delivery will be by international shipping with tracking. After the auction ends, I will contact you for delivery information as well as escrow details.No returns. Do not hesitate to ask questions.arttrading.org
